actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 95-146.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: Resolution authorizing the printing as a House document the dedication ceremony of the portrait of the Honorable Melvin Price, Chairman, Committee on Armed Services.

summary.text: Directs the printing as a House document of the transcript of the proceedings in the Committee on Armed Services of February 16, 1977, incident to the presentation of a portrait of the Honorable Melvin Price.

titles.title: Resolution authorizing the printing as a House document the dedication ceremony of the portrait of the Honorable Melvin Price, Chairman, Committee on Armed Services.
